document.full_text: irving picard, the trustee seeking money for bernard madoff's victims, is suing swiss private bank banque syz & co sa  to recover $73.3 million derived from "feeder" funds in the ponzi schemer's former investment firm.
document.title: madoff trustee sues banque syz for $73.3 million
lines_and_colors: irving picard, the trustee seeking money for bernard madoff's victims, is suing swiss private bank banque syz & co sa  to recover $73.3 million derived from "feeder" funds in the ponzi schemer's former investment firm.
